text: @realDonaldTrump When you die of COVID19 you die alone! Are you all prepared for that possible fate for you or a family member? Will Donald Trump's twitter rants assigning blame ease your pain & suffering? Will a good economy make up for the horrible lonely death of a loved one? Yes or No?
